ComicInfo.Series: Athena Voltaire and the Volcano Goddess
ComicInfo.Summary:
The all-new series starring the fan-favorite pulp heroine concludes. The Nazis stand on the precipice of harnessing the power of the Hollow Earth. To stop the ultimate evil from seizing world domination Athena Voltaire must fight them to the death atop an active volcano!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Steve Bryant & Chad Fidler | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | J. K. Woodward | 2 | Note: The digital edition (1/11/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-28 09:54:34. [CVDB575791]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Chad Fidler, J. K. Woodward, Steve Bryant
